title: TC Energy boss advises U.S. on speeding along oil and gas infrastructure
description: TC Energy's president and CEO led a report examining how the U.S. can build oil and gas infrastructure more quickly, at the same time there's a push to do the same north of the border.
content: A Canadian pipeline boss led a new report advising the Trump administration on how to more quickly build new oil and gas infrastructure in the United States amid a push north of the border to do the … [+5109 chars]
